Keywords: Avengers , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Soldier , Spy
Real Name: Phil Coulson
Special Powers
BACKUP HAS ARRIVED: SIDELINE ACTIVE - When a friendly character of 50 points or more with the S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword rolls for Leadership and succeeds and a 6 was rolled, they may instead generate Agent Coulson from your Sideline on click #1.
I KEEP THE BEST TECH FOR MYSELF: Incapacitate. When Agent Coulson uses it he may also deal his printed damage value to hit characters given an action token.
LEVEL 7 AGENT: Leadership, Outwit. When Agent Coulson uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #002 S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative on click #1.
